question.body: Which of the following cell types is not properly matched with what it secretes?

multiple_choice.choice: Gastric epithelial cells - structure of stomach lumen

response.feedback: Incorrect. Gastric epithelial cells maintain the structure of the mucosa in the stomach lumen.
Correct. G cells secrete gastrin which is a hormone that regulates digestion.
Incorrect. Chief cells secrete both pepsinogen and gastric lipase.
Incorrect. Parietal cells secrete both HCl and intrinsic factor.
